## ? Checklist

<!-- Mark completed items with an "x" -->

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] Any dependent changes have been merged and published

### Documentation

- [ ] I have updated the README if needed
- [ ] I have updated relevant documentation in `/docs`
- [ ] I have added/updated JSDoc comments for new functions
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG

### Security & Performance

- [ ] I have checked for security vulnerabilities
- [ ] I have considered performance implications
- [ ] I have tested on multiple browsers/devices (if UI change)
- [ ] I have ensured accessibility standards are met (if UI change)

### Constitutional AI Alignment (if applicable)

- [ ] AI outputs are aligned with Constitutional AI principles
- [ ] Content moderation is in place
- [ ] No harmful or biased outputs possible
